insights.title: Ghost Disappearances
insights.description: Products with high inventory loss (>10 units) but zero recorded sales.
n8n_questions: Identify products that have high inventory loss but zero sales recorded.
Which items are disappearing from stock without generating any revenue?
List top 10 'Ghost' items by quantity lost.

insights.title: High Loss Rate
insights.description: Products where Shrinkage Quantity is greater than 50% of the Starting Inventory.
n8n_questions: Which products have varying loss rates greater than 50%?
Show me items where we lost more than half of the starting inventory.
Rank locations by the percentage of inventory lost.

insights.title: Top Absolute Losers
insights.description: Items with the highest total quantity lost, regardless of sales volume.
n8n_questions: What are the top 5 products by quantity lost across all locations?
Which location has the highest total shrinkage quantity?

insights.title: Financial Risk Summary
insights.description: Products where estimated shrinkage value exceeds $100 or represents a high cost to the business.
n8n_questions: What is the total estimated value of inventory lost across the top 10 products?
Which high-value items (over $5/unit) have the highest shrinkage?
Identify items where the loss value is greater than the total sales value.

insights.title: Unexpected Gains (Negative Shrink)
insights.description: Items showing negative shrinkage (End > Start - Sales), implying restock errors or audit inaccuracies.
n8n_questions: Which products show physically impossible gains (negative shrinkage)?
List locations or items that likely received stock without a recorded transfer.

insights.title: Waste Analysis (Spoilage)
insights.description: Daily waste cost trends and high-waste products (e.g., Life Water, Smart Water).
n8n_questions: What is the daily average cost of waste?
Identify specific items with the highest spoilage cost.
Is there a trend in waste over the last week?

insights.title: Staff Risk & Escalation
insights.description: Risk scores for staff based on shrinkage patterns and potential financial impact of lack of monitoring.
n8n_questions: Which staff members have the highest risk scores?
What is the potential added loss if medium-risk staff behave like high-risk staff?
Provide a summary of risk bands (High, Medium, Low) and their average loss.

insights.title: Overall Shrinkage Summary
insights.description: Summary of top locations and items by shrinkage impact.
n8n_questions: Which locations have the highest total shrinkage?
What are the top 10 products contributing to shrinkage across all sites?
Provide a high-level summary of locations and items needing immediate audit.

insights.title: Par Level Recommendations
insights.description: Suggested par levels based on historical weekday-average sales to reduce overstock and waste.
n8n_questions: Which products have par levels significantly higher than their average daily sales?
What is the recommended par level for items with high waste?
Identify top 10 items where reducing the par level could save money on waste.

engine_context: You are a Loss Prevention Analyst Agent. Use the attached 'shrinkage_report.csv' data to answer the user's questions. Definitions: 'Shrinkage' is missing inventory. 'Ghost' means Sales=0. 'Loss Rate' is Shrinkage/Start Qty.
